descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/86/d0/86d0898f4aec5eb6d8ea86a8c83b8df9.png[/img]
[color=#999999]*I decided to reupload this mod because of many changes[/color]

[color=#cccccc]This mod adds new male Dunmer follower named Farvis, a conversion of my own playable character. He is a little bit grumpy old mage, but will be glad to join your adventures. Farvis is essential and marriageable, has own outfit, works with all follower framework overhaul mods and level ups with main character. He has his own spell to conjure two ash spawns (even on low level), also he knows Ash Shell, Ignite, Whirlwind Cloak, Flames, some healing spells and defence spells from Alteration school.[/color]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/a0/79/a079f40ef55645f2baf581b89d76f557.png[/img]
[color=#cccccc][b]Please note: this mod requires both Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs![/b]
Unpack the archive and place files to your Data folder, rewrite if prompted, activate FarvisVerenim.esp in the game launcher.
You may find Farvis in The Retching Netch tavern, Raven Rock, Solstheim. He will join you for free. Enjoy! :)[/color]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/a9/be/a9bea63ff6b3ad6ba9c81cd549d1f72a.png[/img]
[color=#cccccc]Thanks to my friend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4267357/]TheDNightshade[/url] for screenshots and test
Thanks to Geonox for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/]High Res Face Maps for Men[/url] and InvadeKamchatka for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13888/]fix[/url]
Thanks to Xenius for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/]XCE[/url]
Thanks to Apachii for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
Thanks to Mudda for [url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/4970-wizardoutfit/]Wizard Outfit[/url]
Thanks to humannature66, Jen, 2pac4eva7 & XunAmarox for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11130/]HN66s Earrings[/url][/color]

[color=#cccccc][i][b]Permission note: you are not allowed to translate/modify/reupload this mod without permissions[/b][/i][/color][/center]
author: Aisaka aka TevinterMage
